傰字的基本解释

傰
péng
古同“朋”，朋党。
姓。

傰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bēng］
［《集韻》悲明切，平登，幫。］
(1)同“崩”。败坏；崩塌。
(2)通“繃”。拉紧，紧板。
[②]［péng］
［《集韻》蒲登切，平登，並。］
(1)朋党。
(2)姓。汉有傰宗。见《汉书·王尊传》。

傰字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傰； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页114第16
【集韻】蒲登切。同朋。【管子·幼官篇】練之以散羣傰署。【註】傰猶曹也。劉績註：卽朋字。　又姓。【漢書】南山羣盜傰宗等數百人。　又【集韻】逋鄧切，崩去聲。人名。【前漢·王子侯表】成煬侯傰。

傰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
傰字的起名意思

暂无。

傰
Basic explanation of words
傰
péng
Gu Tong is a "friend" and party.
name.
傰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bēng］
["Ji Yun" is sad and clear, Ping Deng, help. ]
(1) Same as "Beng". Corrupt; collapse.
(2) Through "stretching". Tighten, tighten the board.
[②]［péng］
["Ji Yun" Pu Dengqie, Ping Deng, and. ]
(1) Clan.
(2) Last name. There is Daizong in the Han Dynasty. See "Han Shu·Wang Zun Biography".
傰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　傰; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 114-16
[Jiyun] Pu Dengqie. Same friends. 【Guanzi·Young Officials】Practice it to disperse the group. [Note] You are also Cao. Liu Ji's Note: The word 卽Peng.　Another last name. [Han] Nanshan Group Pirates Da Zong and hundreds of people.　[Ji Yun] Bu Deng Qi, collapsed. Person's name. [Former Han·Prince Hou Biao] Cheng Yang Hou Lao.
